name: 'Head, Shoulders, Knees & Toes' Album CD
description:
Debut album, released 19th April 2010 and already RECUDED TO JUST FIVE QUID!  Price includes free postage, badges and stickers as well as a free A3 tour poster while stocks last (limited to 50) .

Tracklisting:

1. Head, Shoulders, Knees & Toes
2. Little Wooden Boat
3. The Eagle Has Landed
4. Husband Material
5. A Nightingale Sings In Albert Square
6. Sorry Mr. Prescott
7. Trouble & Strife
8. Asleep At The Wheel
9. Women & Children First
10. Three Is A Crowd
11. Over My Dead Body 

Here's what the press said:

"It might not change the world or your outlook on life, but what it will do is put a smile on your face and keep it there for 36 minutes...A great record for the summer." - Ninehertz.co.uk 

"Each track has a story to tell and it’s done with such a marvellous lyrical ingenuity, they’re thought provoking and entertaining at the same time...a very enjoyable album and well worth a listen" (7/10) - Die Shellsuit Die 

"Reminiscent of Guided By Voices in that lo-fi yet accomplished kinda way..." (4 stars) - Normanrecords.co.uk

name: Album + free EP (own all my songs!)
description:
Choose this option if you wish to take advantage of my EP clearance - buy the album, get my debut EP 'Armchair Historian' absolutely free!

'Head, Shoulders, Knees & Toes' 11-track 2010 album plus:

'Armchair Historian' debut 6-track EP, released October 2008.

Tracklisting:

1. Ode To David Starkey
2. Struck Off The A-List
3. Always The Bridesmaid
4. April Fools
5. If This Was Logan's Run
6. April Fools (ULAGN remix)
